title: A vvarnyng for the cittie of London that the dwellers therein may repent their evyll lyues for feare of Goddes plages.
author: Samuel, William, fl. 1551-1569.
publisher: By me Humfrey Powell, dewellinge [sic] aboue Holburne Conduit, and are to be soulde by Hugh Syngleton at the signe of Saint Augustine in Polles Churcharde [sic],
notes: Imprint from colophon; date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
